@4burner Izzo is still fucking shit. Makes world class saves and lets in stupid shit 2 seconds later. Not reliable.
@4burner Roy's chance conversion rate is fucking abysmal. Wildly behind the rest of the league.
@4burner I'd wipe the entire squad aside from Tavares, Pain, Galloway and _maybe_ Izzo (as a desperate backup - keepers aren't everywhere).
@4burner ...Neill do upon receiving it?? Sprint for 15 metres and then checks the run. Lets them regain their shape. Then back to Izzo.
@4burner "Mild jog" is what fucks me off more than anything. When Tavares was playing, he has a wicked strong pass to his left. What does...
@4burner With our powers combined we couldn't be as bad. At least I wouldn't check every single attacking run I ever do. EVERY. SINGLE. ONE.
@4burner I was a left back during our time at Mingara. Just saying.
If not for insane goalkeeping and the post, Pogba would have scored 5 or 6 world class goals already this season. #STKMUN
